column1: Añatuya is a city in the province of Santiago del Estero
column2: Argentina. It has 23.286 inhabitants as per the 2010 census [INDEC]
column3: and is the head town of the General Taboada Department. It lies on the southeast of the province
column5: and about 150 km from the provincial capital Santiago del Estero.

column1: Añatuya is the seat of the Catholic Diocese of Añatuya
column2: and it was the birthplace of the renowned tango composer Homero Manzi and basketball player Gabriel Deck

column1: Municipal information: Municipal Affairs Federal Institute (IFAM)
Municipalities of the Taboada Department. Santiago del Estero Province
